summary: Request to expose update-with-start operations through the PHP SDK. This feature allows combining workflow updates with workflow start operations, similar to functionality available in other Temporal SDKs.
userImpact: Users cannot leverage update-with-start patterns in PHP applications, limiting their ability to atomically start and update workflows.
resolutionDetails: Feature was implemented to provide API parity with other SDKs
keyQuote: Expose update-with-start operations via the SDK
